entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
